column1: '''Aglahad''' ([[Third Age]] 2827 – 2932, aged 105 years) was the nineteenth [[Prince of Dol Amroth]].<ref name="Dol">{{PM

Aglahad ruled Dol Amroth around the time of [[Ruling Steward
